metadata.synopsis: The players are making their way up to the Netherbrain while being bombarded by the Nautiloid. Swarms of enemies are joining the combat in an attempt to stop the players. This dialog is to reinforce the goal of moving towards the Netherbrain and that fighting the endless onslaught of enemies is pointless.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load END_MainProceed to High Hall InteriorProceed till combat startsPass turns till player AD is triggered

0.speaker: Player
0.text: There's too many of them, we need to get to the brain - now!

1.speaker: Player
1.text: They just keep coming - we can't keep fighting them forever!
